set strStatus = $$$Kill(pstrClass,pid) //SR15134 quit strStatus
/* SR15134 new strYFORM
set strYFORM = $get(YFORM) set YFORM = pstrClass do ^WWWKILL(pstrClass,pid) set YFORM = strYFORM quit */
LastData(Form="",Piece="",Type="M") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Last Data from ^WWWDATEN ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 05-Mar-2004 SCR Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new Data,Date,User
set Data="" set Date=+$horolog set User=$get(YUSER)
if Form="" set Form=" " if User="" set User=" " if Type="" set Type="M" set Data=$piece($get(^WWWDATEN(0,Date,User,Form,Type,1)),"~",Piece) if Data="" { set Data=$piece($get(^WWWDATEN(0,Date,User,Form,Type,2)),"~",Piece) } quit Data
Error(Process) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Cache Error Trapping ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new Status,Tag,Code,Type
set Type=$piece($piece($ze,"<",2),">") set Tag=$piece($ze,">",2) set Code="" if Tag["^" set Code=$text(@Tag) set Status=$listbuild("Fin00175",Process,Type,Tag,Code) ; Post Error During ´%1´ Process, Type %2, Routine %3, Code: %4 quit Status
CodeCheck ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Check Code ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new RtnName
set RtnName="FIN" kill ^mtemp("cc",$job) for { set RtnName=$order(^rMAC(RtnName)) quit:RtnName'["FIN" write RtnName," " set ^mtemp("cc",$job,RtnName)=$$Show^COMCodeCheck(RtnName_".MAC")
} set RtnName="" write !!!,"Finance Code Error Check",! for { set RtnName=$order(^mtemp("cc",$job,RtnName)) quit:RtnName="" write RtnName,",",$get(^mtemp("cc",$job,RtnName)),! }
Index(Val="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Convert Value to @NM Index ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 17-Feb-2004 SCR Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new Index
if Val="" set Val=" " if $data(^CacheTempIndex(Val)) { set Index=$get(^CacheTempIndex(Val)) } else { set Index=$$^WWWUMLAU(Val,1) set ^CacheTempIndex(Val)=Index }
quit Index
IsLinked(pYKEY,pstrClassChild,pintIndex,pidError,pstrClassParent=" ") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Checks whether the specified object has dependencies to it. ; ; Returns: ; ; Notes: ; 1. Assumes one parameter in the error message ; 2. Assumes one key index. ; ; History: ; 08-Apr-2005 shobby/PO SR11814 - Return an error if ((id'=pYKEYold)||(pstrClassChild'=pstrClassParent)) - Different classes may have the same ID. Touch up to SR11942 ; 01-Apr-2005 Steve S SR11942: Fixed linking check ; 15-Jun-2004 shobby Avoid self references. ; 03-May-2004 shobby Replaced YKOMMA with "," ; 09-Mar-2004 shobby Make an educated guess on which is the most relevant ; class to report ($$GetDescription) ; 09-Mar-2004 shobby Can support multiple fields of the same data type. ; 08-Mar-2004 shobby Modified to determine the parent & child descriptions ; 08-Mar-2004 shobby Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new i,id,intIndex,objWWW001,strClassChildDescription new strClassParentDescription,strStatus,pYKEYold
set id="" set strStatus=$$$OK set pYKEYold=pYKEY ;SR11942 set pYKEY=$$Index^FINSYS(pYKEY)
for i=1:1:$length(pintIndex,",") { quit:'$$$ISOK(strStatus)
set intIndex=$piece($piece(pintIndex,",",i),".",1) xecute "set id=$order(^"_pstrClassChild_"s(0,"_intIndex_","""_pYKEY_""",""""))" if (id'="")&&((id'=pYKEYold)||(pstrClassChild'=pstrClassParent)) { ;SR11942 set objWWW001=$get(^WWW001(0,pstrClassChild,1)) set strClassChildDescription=$$GetDescription(pstrClassChild,pintIndex) set objWWW001=$get(^WWW001(0,pstrClassParent,1)) set strClassParentDescription=$piece(objWWW001,Y,1) set strStatus=$lb(pidError,id,strClassChildDescription,strClassParentDescription,pYKEY) } }
quit strStatus
GetDescription(pstrClass,pintIndex) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Gets the description of the class or the description of the first index on ; the parent class ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 01-Apr-2005 Steve S SR11942: Commented parent checking ; 09-Mar-2004 shobby Report on the 2nd part if two part primary key index ; 09-Mar-2004 shobby Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new intIndex,objWWW001,objWWW002,strDescription,strParent,strParentClass
set intIndex=$piece(pintIndex,".",2) if intIndex="" { set objWWW002=$get(^WWW002(0,pstrClass,1,1)) } else { ; Report on the 2nd part if two part primary key index if exists else report on first part. set objWWW002=$get(^WWW002(0,pstrClass,2,1)) if $find($piece(objWWW002,Y,6),$piece(pintIndex,".",1)_".2")=0 { set objWWW002=$get(^WWW002(0,pstrClass,1,1)) } }
;SR11942 -- Commented parent checking ;set strParentClass=$piece(objWWW002,Y,8)
;if (strParentClass'="")&&(strParentClass'=pstrClass) { ; set strDescription=$$GetDescription(strParentClass,pintIndex) ;} else { set objWWW001=$get(^WWW001(0,pstrClass,1)) set strDescription=$piece(objWWW001,Y,1) ;}
quit strDescription
CheckLinks(pYKEY,plstDependencies,pstrParent) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Checks whether the Bank Account can be deleted. ; ; History ; 04-Jul-2005 RobertW SR12527: Fixed Status usage for ReturnError ; 03-Mar-2005 PO SR11814 Use CheckRecordsLinks. ; 06-Jul-2003 shobby Creation (TR005551) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strStatus
set strStatus=$$CheckRecordsLinks(pYKEY,plstDependencies,pstrParent) if $$$ISERR(strStatus) { set Q=1 do ReturnError^COMUtils((strStatus)) } quit strStatus
CheckRecordsLinks(pYKEY,plstDependencies,pstrParent) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Checks whether the record can be deleted. ; ; Return: status ; ; History: ; 03-Mar-2005 PO Creation SR11814 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new i,strClass,strStatus
set strStatus=$$$OK if $get(pYKEY)'="" { for i=1:1:$listlength(plstDependencies) { quit:$$$ISERR(strStatus) set strClass=$listget(plstDependencies,i) set strStatus=$$IsLinked(pYKEY,strClass,$$IndexNo(strClass,pstrParent),"Fin00281",pstrParent) ;%3 ´%4´ can not be deleted! It is used by %2 ´%1´. } } quit strStatus
IndexNo(pstrChild,pstrParent) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Determines the index on the pstrChild class that indexes pstrParent. ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 03-May-2004 shobby Replaced YKOMMA with "," ; 09-Mar-2004 shobby Can now have multiple fields of the same type as ; properties of a class. ; 08-Mar-2004 shobby Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new intIndex,idx,objWWW002,strIndex,i,objWWW003
set idx="" set intIndex="" for { set idx=$order(^WWW002(0,pstrChild,idx)) quit:idx="" ;quit:intIndex>0
set objWWW002=$get(^WWW002(0,pstrChild,idx,1)) if $piece(objWWW002,Y,8)=pstrParent { set strIndex=$piece(objWWW002,Y,6) if strIndex'="" { for i=1:1:$length(strIndex,",") { ;quit:intIndex>0
if $piece(strIndex,",",i)'<50 { if intIndex'="" set intIndex=intIndex_"," set intIndex=intIndex_$piece(strIndex,",",i) } } } } }
set idx="" for { set idx=$order(^WWW003(0,pstrChild,idx)) quit:idx="" ;quit:intIndex>0
set objWWW003=$get(^WWW003(0,pstrChild,idx,1)) if $piece(objWWW003,Y,8)=pstrParent { set strIndex=$piece(objWWW003,Y,6) if strIndex'="" { for i=1:1:$length(strIndex,",") { ;quit:intIndex>0
if $piece(strIndex,",",i)'<50 { if intIndex'="" set intIndex=intIndex_"," set intIndex=intIndex_$piece(strIndex,",",i) } } } } }
;set intIndex=$piece(intIndex,".",1) if intIndex="" set intIndex=0
quit intIndex
TransactionComplete(pstrStatus,pidKey,pobjRecord,pblnInHyperEvent=$$$NO,pblnSave=$$$YES) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; commits or rolls back the transaction ; ; Returns: ; ; NOTE: Procedure to be made OBS as Transaction^COMTransaction is taking over ; ; History: ; 12-Jan-2006 Steve S SR14114: Added pblnSave ; 12-Oct-2005 Frank SR13523: No error on UnPost Supplier Invoice ; 12-Jul-2005 shobby SR12678: Don't redraw the form if inside a HyperEvent ; 06-Jul-2005 PO SR12881: Moved from FINAPPayment ; 27-Jan-2005 RobertW Fixed TCOMMIT and TROLLBACK (SR11273) ; 25-Feb-2004 shobby Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; if all is OK, Update Header & Commit Data
if $$$ISOK(pstrStatus) { if pblnSave set pstrStatus = $$$Save(YFORM,pidKey,pobjRecord,$$$YES) }
if $$$ISOK(pstrStatus) { if $tlevel>0 tcommit do:'pblnInHyperEvent ^WWWFORM } else { trollback if pblnInHyperEvent { ; SR13523 write "alert('"_$$$Text(pstrStatus)_"');" } else { do ^WWWINFO($$$Text(pstrStatus)) } } quit
